discourse_list.title: Can anyone post Maker Improvement Proposals

content.content: Hi guys, I wanted clarity on the token requirement to post proposals
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is seeking clarification on the token requirement to post proposals and is asking for feedback or answers from the community.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: No token requirement. The structural requirements of MIPs can be daunting though, so you probably want to read through the guides, hop in Discord and talk to relevant core units first before proposing.    MIPs Portal    MIPs Portal Maker Improvement Proposals are the preferred mechanism for improving both Maker Governance and the Maker Protocol.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
